name: Classic Margherita Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the dough on a floured surface.
Spread sauce evenly over the dough.
Top with mozzarella slices.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden.
Top with fresh basil and drizzle with olive oil before serving.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Stretch dough onto a pizza stone or baking sheet.
Spread sauce and sprinkle with cheese.
Arrange pepperoni slices on top.
Sprinkle with oregano.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until cheese is bubbly.

name: Vegetarian Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out dough and add sauce.
Add cheese and arrange all vegetables on top.
Bake for 12-15 minutes.
Slice and serve hot.

name: Butter Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garlic, and spices for 15 mins.
Sear chicken in a pan with butter.
Add tomato puree and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and simmer until thick.
Serve with naan or rice.

name: Chana Masala
steps: Sauté cumin seeds and onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and spices.
Pour in tomato puree and cook until oil separates.
Add chickpeas and a splash of water; simmer for 15 mins.
Garnish with cilantro.

name: Palak Paneer
steps: Blanch spinach in boiling water for 2 mins, then blend into a paste.
Fry paneer cubes until golden (optional).
Sauté onion, tomato, and spices in oil.
Add spinach puree and paneer; simmer for 5 mins.
Stir in cream before serving.

name: Aloo Gobi
steps: Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds.
Add potatoes and cauliflower; sauté for 5 minutes.
Add turmeric, coriander, and chili.
Cover and cook on low heat until veggies are tender (approx 15 mins).
Garnish with cilantro.

name: Dal Tadka (Lentil Soup)
ingredients: 1 cup yellow lentils (toor dal or masoor dal)
steps: Boil lentils with water and turmeric until soft.
In a separate small pan, heat ghee.
Add mustard seeds, garlic, and dried chilies (tempering).
Pour the tempering over the cooked dal and mix.

name: Chicken Biryani
steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt and masala.
Par-boil the rice with whole spices.
Layer chicken and rice in a pot.
Top with fried onions, saffron, and mint.
Cover tight and cook on very low heat (dum) for 30 mins.

name: Masala Chai
steps: Boil water with ginger and cardamom.
Add tea leaves and sugar; boil for 2 mins.
Add milk and bring to a boil again.
Strain and serve hot.

name: Avocado Toast with Egg
steps: Toast the bread slices until golden.
Mash the avocado in a bowl with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mash onto the toast.
Fry the eggs to your liking and place one on each toast slice.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
steps: Cook the rice according to package instructions.
Heat oil in a wok or large pan over high heat.
Stir fry chicken until cooked through (about 5-7 mins).
Add garlic and vegetables; stir fry for another 5 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and toss to coat before serving.

name: Vegetable Pasta
steps: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente.
Meanwhile, sauté onions and peppers in olive oil until soft.
Add tomato sauce to the pan and simmer for 5 minutes.
Drain pasta and toss with the sauce. Top with fresh basil.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
steps: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place cheese between the unbuttered sides of the bread.
Heat a skillet over medium heat.
Grill sandwiches until golden brown on both sides and cheese is melted.

name: Greek Salad
steps: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Combine cucumber, tomatoes, onion, and olives in a large bowl.
Sprinkle feta cheese on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and toss gently.

name: Oatmeal with Fruit
steps: Bring water or milk to a boil.
Add oats and reduce heat; simmer for 5 minutes.
Pour into a bowl and top with sliced banana and berries.
Drizzle with honey before eating.

name: Beef Tacos
steps: Brown the ground beef in a skillet; drain excess fat.
Stir in taco seasoning and a splash of water; simmer for 3 mins.
Warm the taco shells in the oven.
Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Caprese Salad
steps: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices alternately on a platter.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze just before serving.

name: Banana Smoothie
steps: Peel the banana and place all ingredients in a blender.
Blend on high until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a glass and serve immediately.

name: Vegetable Fried Rice
steps: Heat oil in a wok. Scramble the eggs quickly and remove.
Sauté onion, carrots, and peas until tender.
Add the cold rice and soy sauce; stir fry on high heat.
Mix the eggs back in and serve hot.
